dcterms:creator: Informatik IX Computer Vision Group
dcterms:description: The TUM Dataset is a series of open-source datasets used in the fields of computer vision and robotics, containing various scenes and objects for training and testing algorithms. The dataset used in this project includes RGB and depth images from a Microsoft Kinect sensor along with its ground-truth trajectory.
dcterms:title: TUM Dataset

dcterms:description: A self-made dataset recorded in a controlled experimental environment using an RGB-D camera to facilitate feature extraction for the ORB-SLAM3 system. The dataset includes RGB and depth images captured while navigating a simple maze.
dcterms:title: Self-made dataset
